response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a purchase price of $1,400,000. We believe this is a fair and competitive offer that reflects the true value of the product while allowing us to maximize our earnings. We look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1400000}
